Articles.Content:
Imagr albums don't display any pictures for me on the forum. Their website doesn't work either.

Is this happening to anyone else?

Is there a way for me to fix it?

I use Chrome.

Edited December 3, 2014 by Engineer Of Stuff
What browser are you using? What attachments, what other programs, etc.?
I found it annoying to work with, so I dumped it. Maybe I'll try it again some other time when I've more patience. lol
